# Library (Building)
## Overview
**Library**

**Create** 29 Goods, 4 Influence, 28 Labor, 2 Magic (1,460 gp)

**Rooms** 2 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repositories]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A large building containing an archive of books.
